short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that makes LIHKG.com better.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to:
1. save content on LIHKG.com in one click.
2. scroll automatically inside a post.

All data will be stored locally so privacy is not a concern.
